projects.title: Solving Wordle using Deep Reinforcement Learning
projects.summary: Using Advantage actor-critic deep reinforcement learning algorithm to solve Worlve.

detail.body: Implemented the Advantage Actor-Critic Deep Reinforcement Learning method to solve 4, 5, and 6-letter variations of Wordle with varying dictionary sizes, demonstrating expertise in advanced machine learning techniques and algorithms.

projects.title: Analysis of a Wooden Arch Bridge using STAAD.Pro
projects.summary: Performed a comprehensive analysis of glued laminated  members of the Eagle River Timber Bridge (Michigan, USA) using STAAD.Pro and AITC 1994 Code.

detail.body: Performed a comprehensive analysis of glued laminated members of the Eagle River Timber Bridge (Michigan, USA) using STAAD.Pro and AITC 1994 Code, accounting for load combinations as per AASHTO LRFD guidelines.

projects.title: Optimization of Traffic Flow Network
projects.summary: Optimized the total travel time for a transportation network of centrally guided, autonomous vehicles.

detail.body: Optimized the total travel time for a transportation network of centrally guided, autonomous vehicles by utilizing the General Algebraic Modeling System.

projects.title: Arduino-driven Equatorial Mount (Star Tracker) for Astrophotography
projects.summary: Designed and fabricated an Arduino-driven equatorial mount under $50 for tracking deep-sky objects.

detail.body: Designed and fabricated an Arduino-driven equatorial mount under $50, optimized for tracking deep-sky objects and capturing high-quality astrophotographs.

projects.title: Origami Inspired Foldable Bridge with Rigid Thick Panels
projects.summary: Modeling thick zipper-coupled Miura origami tubes in Fusion 360.

detail.body: Utilized Fusion360 to model the kinematics of zipper-coupled Miura origami tubes, incorporating rigid thick panels to develop a flat-packable, deployable bridge.

projects.title: Geometric Non-linear Analysis of Truss Structures
projects.summary: Developed a matrix structural analysis program in MATLAB to perform geometric non-linear analysis of 2D truss structures.

detail.body: Developed a matrix structural analysis program in MATLAB by implementing Newton-Raphson and Arc-Length methods to perform geometric non-linear analysis of 2D truss structures, capable of capturing snap-through behavior.

projects.title: Delineation of Water Bodies from Satellite Imagery
projects.summary: Developed a MATLAB program that generates a binary image for delineating water bodies from LANDSAT-8 satellite images.

detail.body: Developed a MATLAB program that generates a binary image for delineating water bodies from LANDSAT-8 satellite images using Normalized Difference Water Index (NDWI), Modified NDWI, and Automated Water Extraction Index.
